headline: Seaport Global Raises PT on Synchrony Financial (SYF); Maintains ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) is one of the 10 Best Cheap Stocks to Buy According to Billionaire Ray Dalio. Bridgewater Associates holds over $33 million worth of shares of SYF, which represents 0.15% of its portfolio. Seaport Global increased its price target on Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) from $66 to $76, maintaining a ‘Buy’ rating. Despite the […]
